alert.note: Alert for Inland Broward County; Metro Broward County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 2:26PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Broward County through 300 PM EDT... At 226 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Weston, or near Pembroke Pines. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pembroke Pines, Davie, Plantation, Sunrise, Weston, Cooper City, Pine Island Ridge, Sawgrass Mills Mall, Sunshine Acres, Intersection I-75 And U.S. 27, Intersection I-75 And Griffin Road and Markham Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Inland Broward County; Metro Broward County
